1.0.1.en: Added inlet and outlet as sensor data

1.0.2.en: Added real power measure as sensor data

1.0.4.en: Fixed login issue. Fixed missing insights on outlet temperature.

1.1.0.en: Ask for username and password, when adding device. Removed the old app settings page. Added support for multiple devices.

1.2.0.en: Added new values. Current/ampere, temperature for surrounding and inverter frequency.

1.6.0.en: Updated translations on labels. Now released on the original app id, so we can go out of test phase (and make a public release)

1.7.0.en: Updated text on app store. Fixes crashes when updating from very old version to newest version

1.8.0.en: Added temperature for exhaust and evaporator. Added fan speed. Better error handling.

1.8.1.en: Removed the 'off' mode. Now we only have one place for switching device on and off. By the switch.

1.8.2.en: Fixed wrongly shown frequency value (it was the exhaust temperature). Added setting for expirimental features. Those features are controlling fan speed and frequency of compressor.
